description: Installation parameters provided for a ESC Sensor

___elevationRadiationPattern.description: ESC antenna radiation pattern or an effective ESC antenna radiation pattern in any direction in the elevation plane

___gain.description: Maximum antenna gain in all horizontal directions, specified at 1 degree increments referenced to true north

___azimuthRadiationPattern.description: an ESC antenna radiation pattern or an effective ESC antenna radiation pattern in any direction in the azimuthal plane, specified at 1 degree increments referenced to the true north

___gain.description: Maximum antenna gain in all horizontal directions, specified at 1 degree increments referenced to true north

___antennaAzimuth.description: the boresight direction of the horizontal plane of the ESC antenna in degrees with respect to true north

___longitude.description: Longitude in WGS84 coordinates, provided in decimal degrees

___latitude.description: Latitude in WGS84 coordinates, provided in decimal degrees

___height.description: Height of ESC Sensor antenna, provided in meters. See heightType for interpretation.

___heightType.description: The reference for the height parameter. AMSL indicates the height is measured relative to mean sea level. AGL indicates the height is measured relative to local ground level at latitude, longitude.

___antennaDowntilt.description: the ESC antenna down tilt in degrees
